metadata.title: CVE-2022-48831 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ima: fix reference leak in asymmetric_verify()Don't leak a reference to the key if its algorithm is unknown.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
